attributes.action: Add politics to the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
As many of the people here understand, the extremist politicians are dominating multiple countries elections.
THIS HAS TO STOP!!!
Teaching politics will help young people understand this threat and make sure that the authoritarian never get into power. 
This will help us as a democratic nation 
My information is supported by speaker politics "Politics should be added to the national curriculum because understanding how laws are made and why civic engagement's important is fundamental."
attributes.background: I belive politics should be added to the junior school curriculum and as a subject necessary to provide as a GCSE by schools in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709820
